name: Creamy Avocado Pasta
about: A deliciously creamy avocado pasta that is both healthy and easy to prepare.
method: Cook pasta according to package instructions.
In a blender, combine avocados, garlic, lemon juice, salt, and pepper.
Toss the cooked pasta with avocado sauce.

name: Spicy Jollof Rice
about: A classic West African dish made with rice, tomatoes, and spices.
method: Sauté chopped onions and bell peppers in a pan.
Add tomato puree and curry powder, cook for 10 minutes.
Add washed rice and stir well.
Pour in water and simmer until rice is cooked.

name: Grilled Plantain Salad
about: A fresh and vibrant salad featuring grilled ripe plantains.
method: Peel and slice plantains, then grill until golden brown.
Chop vegetables and mix in a bowl.
Drizzle with olive oil, salt, and pepper.

name: Mango Coconut Smoothie
about: A refreshing tropical smoothie made with mango and coconut milk.
method: Peel and dice the mango and banana.
Add all ingredients to a blender.

name: Ginger Carrot Soup
about: A warm and comforting soup with the zing of fresh ginger.
method: Sauté onions and ginger until soft.

name: Fried Rice with Tofu
about: A protein-rich fried rice dish with crispy tofu pieces.
method: Cut tofu into cubes and fry until golden.
Sauté garlic and vegetables in a pan.
Stir in soy sauce and cook for 5 minutes.

name: Okra Stew Delight
about: A hearty Ghanaian okra stew rich in flavor and nutrition.
method: Heat oil and sauté onion and pepper.
Cook on medium heat for 20 minutes.

name: Papaya Fruit Bowl
about: A colorful and healthy fruit bowl made with fresh papaya and seasonal fruits.
method: Top with chia seeds and optional yogurt or honey.

name: Coconut Bean Curry
about: A rich and creamy bean curry simmered in coconut milk and spices.
method: Add curry powder and cook for 2 minutes.
Stir in beans and coconut milk.
